question: ‘Ecowrap’ is the flagship economic research report of which financial institution of India?
option4: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
explanation:
India’s largest lender State Bank of India (SBI) has recently released the recent edition of its flagship economic research report ‘Ecowrap’.
As per the report, the GDP growth of India may dip to 1.1 per cent in the current financial year. The main reason for the slash in growth rate is the negative impact of the coronavirus outbreak on Indian economy. It also highlighted that the growth rate of 2019-20 is estimated at 4.1 per cent.
